argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matmulr.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matmulr.t | |- .x. = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) e. _V |
| 4 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) e. _V |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_eqeltri | |- .x. e. _V |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) e. _V /\ .x. e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mulrid | |- .r = Slot ( .r ` ndx ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_setsid | |- ( ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) e. _V /\ .x. e. _V ) -> .x. = ( .r ` ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> .x. = ( .r ` ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 10, 2 | #P_matval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> A = ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( .r ` A ) = ( .r ` ( ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> .x. = ( .r ` A ) ) |
